name: Roll or Retreat - GMTK 2022 Game Jam Entry
name_original: Roll or Retreat - GMTK 2022 Game Jam Entry
description:
Solo developed game for GMTK's annual 48 hour game jam!

-- Didn't make the deadline but took some extra time to add some more features to it..

More instructions, later... 
Roll the dice to add to your dice pool..
Each cannon ball does something different..
Defend the wall and try to get a 100 dice surplus..

Currently no win state..
